text: A raznoglasiya mezhdu vami otnositel'no very i neveriya razreshit tol'ko Allakh, i On uzhe pokazal vam eto resheniye. Skazhi im, o Mukhammad: "Allakh - Tot, kto razreshit vashi raznoglasiya i rassudit vas, On vlasten nado mnoy, na Nego ya polozhilsya vo vsekh moikh delakh, i k Nemu ya pribegayu i obrashchayus' vo vsom
